channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- BIOS

item.title: CVE-2020-8321|2024-08-04T09:56:28.334Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the System Lock Preinstallation driver in some Lenovo Notebook and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-8334|2024-08-04T09:56:28.321Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: The BIOS tamper detection mechanism was not triggered in Lenovo ThinkPad T495s, X395, T495, A485, A285, A475, A275 which may allow for unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2020-8354|2024-08-04T09:56:28.369Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the VariableServiceSmm driver in some Lenovo Notebook models may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-8320|2024-08-04T09:56:28.434Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: An internal shell was included in BIOS image in some ThinkPad models that could allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2020-8336|2024-08-04T09:56:28.349Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: Lenovo implemented Intel CSME Anti-rollback ARB protections on some ThinkPad models to prevent roll back of CSME Firmware in flash.

item.title: CVE-2020-8322|2024-08-04T09:56:28.318Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the Legacy USB driver in some Lenovo Notebook and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-8352|2024-08-04T09:56:28.322Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: In some Lenovo Desktop models, the Configuration Change Detection BIOS setting failed to detect SATA configuration changes.

item.title: CVE-2020-8333|2024-08-04T09:56:28.329Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the EEPROM driver in some Lenovo Desktops and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution

item.title: CVE-2020-8323|2024-08-04T09:56:28.326Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the Legacy SD driver in some Lenovo ThinkPad, ThinkStation, and Lenovo Notebook models may allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-08-02T11:25:18.371Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-04-05T20:46:00.491Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-07-31T19:31:26.044Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
